title: Cant finish patching!!!
body: i keep trying to patch it but it gets up to like 90% then a message pops up saying "unspecified error" then it shoots back down to 33% and tries again just to get up to 90% and the same thing happens :/ help would be greatly appreciated!!

replies.body:
Errors at this point during patching are usually linked to the patcher dropping its connection to our patching servers. Since this is commonly caused by conflicting network settings, I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the common solutions.

Let me know if this worked for you.
